name: Racing Riders XD
description:
*** Racing Riders XD ***

Hit the streets again and win the gold! Tracker Acely is back, and has his eyes on winning the rare street trophies. Find your way city to city in search of these coveted prizes.

- Multi-Course City Race Tracks

- Twenty-three unique textured courses

- Random Track Order Crossroads

- Invisible Speed Ups

- Invisible hazards

- Different numbers of racers
